title: 岩浆的解禁
author: sjfdok
txt_content: 请问服务器如何解禁岩浆？要详细过程！谢谢{:10_523:}

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
./plugins/essentials/config.yml
  blacklist:

    # 阻止玩家放置以下方块
    placement: 10,11,46,327

    # 阻止玩家使用以下物品
    usage: 327

replies.author: Hong-Jian
